amendment.description: An amendment to reduce the "Departmental Management and Operations, Departmental Operations, Office of the Secretary and Executive Management" Account by $28,400,000 and increase the "U.S. Customs and Border Protection, Salaries and Expenses" Account by $25,000,000.

action.text: By unanimous consent, the Brown (FL) amendment was withdrawn.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A025) offered by Ms. Brown (FL).
